long_description: With built-in fenders and an upright riding position, the Cannondale Bad Boy Commuter smoothly navigates city streets on commutes and everyday rides. 6061 aluminum frame lends itself to quick acceleration; upright geometry and flat handlebar offer a responsive, stable ride without feeling twitchy. Shimano 3x8 drivertrain offers snappy shifts through 24 gears to quickly get you up hilly streets and swiftly cruising along bike lanes. Shimano mechanical disc brakes make quick work of reducing speed, even in the rain. Fast and stable WTB Thick Slick tires offer smooth-rolling performance. Specs on the Cannondale Bad Boy Commuter bike are subject to change.
